Huawei saw a 42% increase in market share, reaching 15.3%, while Vivo claimed the top spot in September with a 19% share. China's government has announced the expansion of consumption subsidies to include smartphones and other electronics, expected to benefit domestic brands like Huawei and Xiaomi. Apple has responded with a promotional event in China, offering discounts on several iPhone 16 models.
